actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 for 1 year with regard to the broadcasting of certain professional home games.

summary.text: Provides for the television broadcasting of professional baseball, football, basketball, and hockey home games for a one-year period, providing the game is sold out forty-eight hours in advance and is under the authority of a league television contract.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 for 1 year with regard to the broadcasting of certain professional home games.
